title: DHS Tirupathur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 07 Driver, Therapist and Other Posts
description: The District Health Society Tirupathur (DHS Tirupathur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Psychologist, Yoga Doctor, Occupational Therapist, Special Educator, Driver, and Physiotherapist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, 10th Pass, Ant Degree, BPT, BHMS can grab this chance and apply for the DHS Tirupathur Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, educational details, and how to app...
